Perceptor/Elita:

"A predacon perhaps"said Almost ironical Perceptor"But as MAximals you 
should have a maximal one"

"Will my mommy come back soon?"Said a childish voice trought the speakers of 
the medical room "I miss her terribly"

"Good"said coldly Perceptor "Extra stress"

From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Sunday, December 19, 2010 5:12 PM

85% . . . 90% . . . 95% . . .

*DING*

�Predacon shell program deleted� The computer emitted as it came to a
completion.

Legacy quickly ran a scan over Nightlight's form, as lights blinked
and speakers hummed. His single optic pulsed as he looked at it, "All
systems are operating as expected." he said cooly as he examined the
scanner's readout. "Nightlight's personality matrix has been erased,
leaving her memories intact."

Bump nodded excitedly as he stood next to Nightlight, "You're almost
home he said." looking at her.

Santon stood with his arms folded over his chest, his optics looking
at Nightlight and then at Perceptor, "Well she is purged." he said,
his words dour. "So, we have a Maximal that became a Predacon who has
now been purged of everthing." Santon turned to face Perceptor, "So do
you have Maximal program handy?"

(TAG)

Preston
